title: Pheno4D: A spatio-temporal dataset of maize and tomato plant point ...
summary: This article describes Pheno4D, a spatio-temporal dataset of maize and tomato plant point clouds, and discusses its processing using point cloud software.
usefulness_reason: The title and content clearly indicate a 'spatio-temporal dataset' and 'point cloud processing,' which is relevant to spatio-temporal data and point processes. However, it's not directly about the theoretical aspects of spatio-temporal point processes or survey data.
